title: Pharmacy, Groceries & Everyday Basics | Lewis

description: Shop your local Lewis for everyday savings, close to home. With lawn and garden, home essentials, and easy pharmacy pickup, we're your first stop.
cleaned_text: Spirit Lake Vaccination Clinic October 4, 2023 Lewis Family Drug: 2202 17th St., Spirit Lake, IA 51360 [Store Details](https://www.lewisdrug.com/stores/lewis-family-drug-spirit-lake-ia) Vaccine available includes the standard Quadrivalent Influenza Vaccine (QIV) as well as vaccines recommended for those over 65 years of age. WHILE QUANTITIES LAST. Contact the pharmacy for immunization
